definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_negate"><value name="BOOL"><block type="is_item_on_cooldown"><value name="item"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="deal_damage"><value name="amount"><block type="get_attribute"><field name="attribute">ATTACK_DAMAGE</field><value name="entity"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="damagesource"><block type="damagesource_from_type"><field name="damagetype">PLAYER_ATTACK</field></block></value></block></statement><next><block type="item_cooldown_for"><value name="item"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"></block></value><value name="ticks"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">50</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
